mean_cn: adj. 阿拉伯的；阿拉伯语言的；  n. 阿拉伯人
mean_en: a member of a Semitic people originally from the Arabian peninsula and surrounding territories who speaks Arabic and who inhabits much of the Middle East and northern Africa
sentence: Arab men usually wear scarves on their heads.
sentence_trans: 阿拉伯男人头上通常都戴着围巾。
